meanings.definition: Water that falls in drops from the clouds.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, the rains poured down heavily.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's crops needed the nourishment from the rains.
meanings.sent3: The children happily played in the refreshing rains.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the rains on the roof was like a soothing lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the rains brought memories of childhood back to her.

meanings.definition: To fall as water in drops from the clouds.
meanings.sent1: When it rains, the flowers in the garden grow taller.
meanings.sent2: I hope it rains soon to cool down the hot weather.
meanings.sent3: The cat dislikes when it rains because it can't go outside.
meanings.sent4: The news predicts it will rain heavily tomorrow.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain always relaxes me after a long day.

meanings.definition: To send down in great quantities.
meanings.sent1: The company owner rains praises on his hardworking employees.
meanings.sent2: After the victory, the crowd cheers and rains confetti.
meanings.sent3: She loves to bake and always rains sugar on her desserts.
meanings.sent4: The magician's act involved raining colorful scarves from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The coach rains encouragement on the team during the game.
